channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 20-Dec-15
item.description:
"Botswana is also the only country in the world with a colour in its flag meant to represent rain (a sort of blue-grey). Not many people know this."

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

item.title: 19-Dec-15
item.description:
"But ye gotta know *where* ye're just gonna rush in. Ye cannae just rush in *anywhere*. It looks bad, havin' to rush oout again straight awa'."

Feegle tactics - Terry Pratchett, The Wee Free Men

item.title: 18-Dec-15
item.description:
"They stared at them. Staring is one of the few things frogs are good at. Thinking isn't."

- Terry Pratchett, Wings

item.title: 17-Dec-15
item.description:
"I AM DEATH, NOT TAXES. *I* TURN UP ONLY ONCE."

- Terry Pratchett, Feet of Clay

item.title: 16-Dec-15
item.description:
"In Ghat they believe in vampire watermelons, although folklore is silent about *what* they believe about vampire watermelons. Possibly they suck back."

- Terry Pratchett, Carpe Jugulum
